name: mysalesguide3-presentation-api
description: This is the official repository for the `mySALESGUIDE3` presentation API. It provides an JavaScript-API to access functionalities and/or data of the `mySALESGUIDE3` app. This API only works inside of a `mySALESGUIDE3` presentation.
author: mySALESGUIDE GmbH
